data.utilizationMethod: Place the rabbit so its side faces you; sweep the pen across the layered surface on the flank in short, gentle passes.
Grip the cylindrical battery lengthwise between thumb and index finger, support with middle finger, and glide one flat end over the surface to mimic pen strokes
Pinch the front edge of a seat cushion between thumb on top and fingers underneath, compressing the padded leather
Place the card flat on the tabletop and glide the battery across the face in any direction.

data.proxyObjectName: black ballpoint pen with silver clip
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the pen in a precision grip near its tip and make controlled strokes over the desk surface.

data.proxyObjectName: black and silver extendable selfie stick
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the foam handle firmly, extend the rod outward, and swing the phone cradle end forward and back like a paint roller head.
